thread.title: Arsenal boss Arsene Wenger has claimed it will be ‘absolutely marvellous’ if Chelsea go on and break the Gunners’ 14 game consecutive win record
thread.title_full: Arsenal boss Arsene Wenger has claimed it will be ‘absolutely marvellous’ if Chelsea go on and break the Gunners’ 14 game consecutive win record

author: sunsportonline
title: Arsenal boss Arsene Wenger has claimed it will be ‘absolutely marvellous’ if Chelsea go on and break the Gunners’ 14 game consecutive win record
text:
EFL You what? Arsenal boss Arsene Wenger has claimed it will be ‘absolutely marvellous’ if Chelsea go on and break the Gunners’ 14 game consecutive win record 
The Frenchman also believes that the title is Chelsea's to lose this year as they look like a different side since they were thrashed at the Emirates by mark irwin
